'''Shivada Jade''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Characters#Ascensions|ascension]] of [[character]]s.

Shivada Jade is associated with the [[Cryo]] element.

==Types==
{{Material Quality
|2=Shivada Jade Sliver
|3=Shivada Jade Fragment
|4=Shivada Jade Chunk
|5=Shivada Jade Gemstone
}}

==Full Description==
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."<br />
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?"<br />
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

==Trivia==
* The item description is narrated by the [[Tsaritsa]].

===Etymology===
*The English name for this item derives "Shivada" from {{w|Shiva}}, a primary Hindu deity known as the God of Destruction, and has paradoxical traits of both benevolence and malevolence.
*In the Chinese version, "Shivada" is instead {{Lang|mini=1|zh=哀叙冰|zh_rm=Āi Xù Bīng|zh_tl=Grieving/Lamenting Ice}} (literally "Grief-Narrating Ice").
